title: Yoshiwara Boys To Moral Girl!
alternative_title: Yoshiwara Boys & Moral Girl! ; Yoshiwara Boys to Moral Girl - Furare Makutta Arasa ga Gyakuten Yoshiwara de Joshi no Shiawase Otetsudai shimasu ; Yoshiwara Boys to Moral Girl - Furare Makutta Arasaa ga Gyakuten Yoshiwara de Joshi no Shiawase Otetsudai shimasu ; Yoshiwara Boys to Moral Girl! ; 吉原ボーイズとモラルガール! ; 吉原ボーイズとモラルガール！～フラれまくったアラサーが逆転吉原で女子の幸せお手伝いします。～
status: Yoshiwara Boys & Moral Girl! ; Yoshiwara Boys to Moral Girl - Furare Makutta Arasa ga Gyakuten Yoshiwara de Joshi no Shiawase Otetsudai shimasu ; Yoshiwara Boys to Moral Girl - Furare Makutta Arasaa ga Gyakuten Yoshiwara de Joshi no Shiawase Otetsudai shimasu ; Yoshiwara Boys to Moral Girl! ; 吉原ボーイズとモラルガール! ; 吉原ボーイズとモラルガール！～フラれまくったアラサーが逆転吉原で女子の幸せお手伝いします。～
description:
Description :
        Rinko, a devoted teacher who has zero luck with men, gets dumped by her boyfriend because of sex. She is heartbroken, when a truck crashes into her and she dies... only for her to be reincarnated in a "reverse" Yoshiwara district (Japan's famous Edo-era pleasure district), where beautiful men sell their sexual services! Is this Heaven? Or Hell...?! An Edo-era reincarnation rom-com begins here!
